WRITING.TITLE: My Keybase proof [reddit:subject1589 = keybase:itriip] (1Q5uUhOmXvkDVOZLLOI7FSRvwhOxjb177ZsfGjA0QQY)
WRITING.TEXT: ### Keybase proof I am: * [subject1589](https://www.reddit.com/user/subject1589) on reddit. * [itriip](https://keybase.io/itriip) on keybase. Proof: 

I would call customer service and cancel one right away or you're just asking for extra work. You will only ever have the ability to cancel the trial for one on the website, then when you think you're golden you get hit with charges from the other line. I got fucked (temporarily), I mean I disputed it but was definitely a pain in the ass til I finally got my $ back, lol. ... 5 months later... started a new trial on a fresh account. #128514;
bahaha I know, I read the rest of the comments... I should really start reading first, and posting second lol. .. anyhow, smart move brother. do you like the carrier so far?

WRITING.TITLE: One month clean off of Methadone.
WRITING.TEXT: I never thought I'd be off opiates, or a maintenance. ..but will my quality of life ever return?, or will I always feel weak and useless? This is frustrating.

Thank you. I know that I need to do the work but I'm just so exhausted anymore, not motivated and pretty depressed. A lot of other life issues are involved here but generally speaking, it's pretty rough right now.
I am hoping for some relief soon. Thanks for the comment.
Habit(s), it's the changing of everything possibly. Not something I'm accustomed to.
Hard to stay busy when you're now in a giant (unfamiliar) city with no money and no car. #128514;
I have been actively looking for work and the trade thing is a good idea, thanks for the good vibes!
I'm sorry.. but seriously, look at those hands and feet and ask yourself "is that a female?".
60mg; no, 2 week taper to zero; jumped.
